title: New Forum Sale! - T201's (Cobb / Matty / HOF!) Last Reduction Before Ebay!
author: old-baseball

posts.post_title: New Forum Sale! - T201's (Cobb / Matty / HOF!) Last Reduction Before Ebay!
posts.post_content:
I have the following T201's for outright sale that are in really nice condition as described and shown.  Price includes shipping and insurance and PayPal is acceptable.  Some have sold on ebay but pricing here is lower.  Let me know there's any interest.  Cards include:

**SOLD-Wheat / Bergen - VGEX - $90 - Very light lower right corner wrinkle.-SOLD**
**SOLD-Hartzell / Blair - EX+ - $75-SOLD**
Huggins / Breshnahan - EXMT - PayPal - $345 Check / MO - $335
**SOLD - Mathewson / Bridwell - EX - $400 - SOLD**
Brown / Hofman - EX+ - PayPal - $145    Check / MO - $140
Evers / Chance - EX - PayPal - $207    Check / MO - $200
**SOLD-Chase / Sweeney - EX - $90-SOLD**
**SOLD - Cicotte / Thoney - EX+ - $160 - SOLD**
Crawford / Cobb - EX+ - PayPal - $1,050    Check / MO - $975
**SOLD - Lord / Daugherty - VGEX - $90 - SOLD**
**SOLD- Killian / Fitzpatrick - VGEX - $40 - Very light lower right corner wrinkle -SOLD**
Lush / Hauser - EX - A couple of light surface indentations (pencil point size) that don't break the paper - PayPal - $65   Check / MO - $62
Summers / Jennings - EX - PayPal - $125    Check / MO - $120
**SOLD-Lake / Wallace - EX+ - $125-SOLD**

If you want all six remaining cards I will sell as a lot for PayPal - $1,870  or Check / MO -$1,790.
